newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown -1.90 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown -1.90 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 30.610 to the dollar after Tuesday's fixing at 30.832, and at 17.783 to the mark from 17.846.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of -1.90 percent, after a deviation of -2.40 on Tuesday.
During the minute at which the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at -1.95 percent.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated between 11:30:00 and 11:30:59 CET.
